channel.title: Please help,npcs attack people
channel.description: Hey all So,recently,people have come on,and the npc at my home attacks them. I think it may be because they aint using my client,but im not sure Anyway to make it so when they use moparscape client,santa doesnt attack them!? Also,is there any way to have my client(with customs)into a webpage i know there is tutorials but i never understand em,and i have no where 2 put the webclient into,(i need it 2 be free)

item.title: Please help,npcs attack people
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

go into npc.java or something like that and make sure there case number isnt inside the annoy method or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help,npcs attack people
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I had this problem once, it was a person on a cheat client. Make sure the user isn’t using a cheat client and abusing the system.

PS http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=336494.0

Read full topic

item.title: Please help,npcs attack people
